name: GET deRAILED
description:
Rob the incoming train by blowing up the bridge it's about to pass. Place dynamite on the hinges to blow the thing to smithereens!

3 levels to try and beat. With a secret if you beat the 3rd level.

Play in full screen recommended.

Made for the UNWRAP game jam. 

Made by:

Youri Deraes

Sedes de Cock

Jeroen Gesquiere

Stef Kluskens

Alexandra Haller

Jorrit Van de Velde
